title: Amy Charity on American gravel moving to Finland: FNLD GRVL, Valtteri Bottas, and the future of gravel
content:
The SBT GRVL founder sits down to talk about moving success from America to Finland, their partnership with Valtteri Bottas, and the future of gravel races in Europe.

Read the full article at Amy Charity on American gravel moving to Finland: FNLD GRVL, Valtteri Bottas, and the future of gravel on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
